org.sd.text
Interface Trie

All Known Implementing Classes:
BruteForceTrie, DoubleArrayTrie
public interface Trie

Implementation of a trie for string matching.

Author:
Spence Koehler

Method Summary
 boolean add(java.lang.String string)
          Add the given string to this trie.
 boolean contains(java.lang.String string)
          Search for the given complete string in this trie.
 boolean containsPrefix(java.lang.String string)
          Search for the given string as a prefix to a word in this trie.
 void dump(java.io.DataOutput dataOut)
          Serialize this trie.
 int getMaxDepth()
          Get the max depth, which is the length of the longest word in this trie.
 long getNumEncodedChars()
          Get the total number of characters that have been encoded in this trie.
 int getNumWords()
          Get the number of words contained in this trie.
 void read(java.io.DataInput dataIn)
          Deserialize the data into this trie, replacing any existing trie data with the contents.
 

Method Detail

add

boolean add(java.lang.String string)
Add the given string to this trie.

Returns:
true if the string was added; false if it is already in this trie.

contains

boolean contains(java.lang.String string)
Search for the given complete string in this trie.

Returns:
true if the string is a complete entry in this trie; otherwise, false;

containsPrefix

boolean containsPrefix(java.lang.String string)
Search for the given string as a prefix to a word in this trie.

Returns:
true if the prefix is in this trie; otherwise, false.

getMaxDepth

int getMaxDepth()
Get the max depth, which is the length of the longest word in this trie.

getNumWords

int getNumWords()
Get the number of words contained in this trie.

getNumEncodedChars

long getNumEncodedChars()
Get the total number of characters that have been encoded in this trie.

This gives an introspective count of the total information contained in the trie to track compression metrics.

dump

void dump(java.io.DataOutput dataOut)
          throws java.io.IOException
Serialize this trie.

Throws:
java.io.IOException

read

void read(java.io.DataInput dataIn)
          throws java.io.IOException
Deserialize the data into this trie, replacing any existing trie data with the contents.

Throws:
java.io.IOException
